backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related frontend files, and component versions for the Valentine app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining detailed color tokens and styles; appears unused duplicate of main theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with Valentine-themed title and meta description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React UI for Valentine prompt with Yes action showing meme and No button that evades via randomized movement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and helper methods for login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Primary Tailwind theme file defining romantic pink/white variables and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color palette, container settings, and extended utilities including animations and keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic single-page Valentine proposal app, its features, requirements, and current state.
